text: On nizvodit s neba vodu: yeyu My vyrashchayem rasteniya vsekh vidov: yeyu vyrashchayem zlak, yeyu vyrashchayem khlebnyye zorna, ryadami razmeshchaya ikh v kolose; na pal'makh - zavyaz' finikov v plotno slozhennykh grozd'yakh; v sadakh - vinogradnyye lozy, masliny, granaty, to pokhozhiye, to nepokhozhiye odni na drugikh. Vzglyanite na plody ikh, kogda oni nalivayutsya, kogda zreyut: v etom znameniya dlya lyudey veruyushchikh
